## BASIC\_DEFAULT\_REST\_METHOD\_MIDDLEWARES variable

Definition of basic defaut array of rest middlewares used for each rest method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
BASIC_DEFAULT_REST_METHOD_MIDDLEWARES: Type<RestMiddleware>[]
```
